h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: At the bridge, you'll see a large rock on the other side. Go around the rock and to the other side to find a path lined with fires.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'Bell 1'.
The content is as follows:
At the bridge, you'll see a large rock on the other side. Go around the rock and to the other side to find a path lined with fires.
